Sentencas: A detailed comparison of the performance between a simple mono-block-layer build type solid oxide fuel cell geometry and a mono-block-layer-build type solid oxide fuel cell with an embedded porous pipe in the air supply channel is carried out.
Titulo: DETAILED COMPARISON OF THE PERFORMANCE BETWEEN A SIMPLE AND A MODIFIED MONO-BLOCK-LAYER-BUILT TYPE SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL

Sentencas: The study considers constant and variable porosities along the porous pipe, fed with an air-flow in a counter-flow arrangement.
Titulo: DETAILED COMPARISON OF THE PERFORMANCE BETWEEN A SIMPLE AND A MODIFIED MONO-BLOCK-LAYER-BUILT TYPE SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL

Sentencas: Four cases are analyzed: without the porous pipe, with a pipe of constant porosity, with two different porosities, and with four variable porosities.
Titulo: DETAILED COMPARISON OF THE PERFORMANCE BETWEEN A SIMPLE AND A MODIFIED MONO-BLOCK-LAYER-BUILT TYPE SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL

Sentencas: This work is based in a 3-D CFD model that considers the phenomena of mass transfer, heat transfer, species transport, and electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: DETAILED COMPARISON OF THE PERFORMANCE BETWEEN A SIMPLE AND A MODIFIED MONO-BLOCK-LAYER-BUILT TYPE SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL

Sentencas: Detailed comparisons of the voltage, temperature, and species concentration are illustrated.
Titulo: DETAILED COMPARISON OF THE PERFORMANCE BETWEEN A SIMPLE AND A MODIFIED MONO-BLOCK-LAYER-BUILT TYPE SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL

Sentencas: The electrode-electrolyte interface contours of species concentration, temperature, and electric fields are compared.
Titulo: DETAILED COMPARISON OF THE PERFORMANCE BETWEEN A SIMPLE AND A MODIFIED MONO-BLOCK-LAYER-BUILT TYPE SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL

Sentencas: The results show that there is approximately twice the current density in the geometry that considers the two different porosities compared to the simple geometry.
Titulo: DETAILED COMPARISON OF THE PERFORMANCE BETWEEN A SIMPLE AND A MODIFIED MONO-BLOCK-LAYER-BUILT TYPE SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL

Sentencas: The consumption of hydrogen has the same behavior for the entire tested current density, while the availability of oxygen at the cathode-electrolyte interface is improved in cases with porous pipe compared to the simple mono-block-layer-build type geometry.
Titulo: DETAILED COMPARISON OF THE PERFORMANCE BETWEEN A SIMPLE AND A MODIFIED MONO-BLOCK-LAYER-BUILT TYPE SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL

Sentencas: The use of a porous pipe embedded in the air channel showed that it is possible to have a wider operating range of a mono-block-layer-build type solid oxide fuel cell, and allowed to obtain a more homogeneous temperature distribution on the electrode-electrolyte interface of the solid oxide fuel cell, consequently, there is the possibility of reducing the thermal stress in the solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: DETAILED COMPARISON OF THE PERFORMANCE BETWEEN A SIMPLE AND A MODIFIED MONO-BLOCK-LAYER-BUILT TYPE SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL
